# DNS Records for asoos.2100.cool
# Generated by Dr. Claude Orchestrator - SSL Fix
# Date: 2025-05-11T06:25:44.122Z
# Use existing site: 2100-cool

# A record pointing to Firebase hosting
A @ 151.101.1.195 3600

# CNAME for www subdomain
CNAME www 2100-cool.web.app 3600

# TXT record for Google site verification
TXT @ google-site-verification=qd4-fR7eS7X-jT2SbnOLh_YmQ9sBcDZuLqGxkL4 3600

# INSTRUCTIONS:
# 1. Add these DNS records to your domain registrar
# 2. Wait for DNS propagation (24-48 hours)
# 3. Firebase will automatically provision the SSL certificate

# Note: Since we can't create a new site due to quota limitations,
# we're connecting asoos.2100.cool to the existing 2100-cool site.
